title: Dior: From Paris to the World, an interview with Florence M端ller
itunes:title: Dior: From Paris to the World, an interview with Florence M端ller
description:
Just in time for Fashion Week, Dressed is back for Season 2 with a behind-the-scenes look at Denver Art Museum's exhibition Dior: From Paris to the World. We are joined by the exhibition's curator and foremost Dior expert Florence M端ller.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
